structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Nonbeverage alcohol not to be sold for beverage purposes.
law.text: No person shall knowingly sell any alcoholic product intended for nonbeverage purposes under KRS 243.320, under circumstances from which he or she might reasonably deduce the intention of the purchaser to use it for beverage purposes.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 87, effective June 25, 2013. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-193.
